channel.title: graphics on Joone Blog
channel.description: Recent content in graphics on Joone Blog

item.title: Rust & DRM
item.description: I was surprised that there are many low-level graphics projects written in Rust and I started looking into one of them: drm-rs.

item.title: Firefox3 beta1 & Cairo Graphics
item.description: As expected, Mozilla finally has started the beta test of Firefox3 after finished the alpha8 test.
